d6270c9f-0ee5-42ba-9263-a2ed3ad559c8 Cameco increases 2023 revenue outlookSubstantial uranium spot price improvements have contributed to higher average realised prices, CEO Tim Gitzel said in the company's third-quarter results announcement which also included updates on the progress of the first shipment of its share of 2023 production from Inkai in Kazakhstan and news of a new senior appointment to head its UK subsidiary.
